name: Dog Days
effects: For each 3 StrangersIcon, lose -1 CrewIcon. Then lose -3 StrangersIcon. If no CrewIcon was lost, gain +1 StrangersIcon. ArgoFateIcon 7+ Gain +2 StrangersIcon.
removeEffect: Remove until the next Timeline Battle

name: Minoan Fleet
effects: Resolve an effect based on your Diplomacy with Minoans. Allied Gain +1 HullIcon. Friendly Gain 4 Trireme resources. Neutral Each Argonaut gains +1 DangerIcon. Unfriendly Gain +1 ArgoFateIcon. Denounced Lose -1 Titan. At War Lose -1 HullIcon. ArgoFateIcon 7+ Random Argonaut gains 1 Despair token.
removeEffect: Remove until the next Timeline Battle

name: Hornsworn Fleet
effects: Resolve an effect based on your Diplomacy with Hornsworn. Allied Gain +1 Progress. Friendly Chosen Argonaut gains 1 Mnemos node. Neutral Chosen Argonauts gain +1 Danger. Unfriendly Gain +1 ArgoFateIcon. Denounced Gain +2 Strangers. At War Lose -1 Crew. ArgoFateIcon 7+ Random Argonaut gains 1 Despair token.
removeEffect: Remove until the next Timeline Battle

name: Labyrinthian Vessel
effects: Resolve an effect based on your Diplomacy with Labyrinthians. Allied Gain +1 CrewIcon and +1 StrangersIcon. Friendly Gain 1 Calcified Knuckle Bone or Fleshy Mantle resource and +1 StrangersIcon. Neutral Each Argonauts gain +1 FateIcon. Unfriendly Gain +1 ArgoFateIcon. Denounced At the start of the next Timeline Battle, Escalate 1. At War Gain 1 DoomIcon. ArgoFateIcon 7+ Random Argonaut gains 1 Despair token.
removeEffect: Remove until the next Timeline Battle

name: Trade Post
effects: Gain 1 Trireme. Friendly+ Gain 2 Trireme resources instead.

name: Trade Post
effects: Gain 1 Trireme. Friendly+ Gain 2 Trireme resources instead.

name: Fishing Pier
effects: Gain 2 Trireme resources. Denounced- Chosen Argonaut gains +1 DangerIcon.

name: Trireme Wreck
effects: Gain 2 Trireme resources. Denounced- Chosen Argonaut gains +1 DangerIcon.

name: Trireme Wreck
effects: Gain 2 Trireme resources. Denounced- Chosen Argonaut gains +1 DangerIcon.

name: Smithy
effects: Gain 1 Armament resource. Friendly+ Gain 2 Armament resources instead.

effects: Gain 1 Armament resource. Friendly+ Gain 2 Armament resources instead.

effects: Gain 2 Armament resources. Denounced- Gain 1 Armament resource instead.

name: Abandoned Shrine
effects: Gain 1 Monument resource. Friendly+ Gain 2 Monument resources instead.

name: Abandoned Shrine
effects: Gain 1 Monument resource. Friendly+ Gain 2 Monument resources instead.

name: Temple Ruins
effects: Gain 2 Monument resources. Denounced- Chosen Argonaut gains +1 FateIcon.

name: Temple Ruins
effects: Gain 2 Monument resources. Denounced- Chosen Argonaut gains +1 FateIcon.

name: Titan
effects: Gain 1 Titan. Friendly+ Chosen Argonaut gains +1 RageIcon.

name: Abandoned Fleet
effects: Gain 3 Trireme resources. Denounced- Gain +1 ArgoFateIcon.

name: Old Armory
effects: Gain 3 Armament resources. Allied Gain 4 Armament resources instead.

effects: Gain 3 Monument resources. Denounced- Gain +1 DoomIcon.

name: Abandoned Fleet
effects: Gain 3 Trireme resources. At War Lose -1 Titan.

name: Desecrated Temple
effects: Gain 2 Monument resources. Denounced- Gain +1 StrangersIcon.

name: Shipyard
effects: Gain 4 Trireme resources. Denounced- Chosen Argonaut gains +1 DangerIcon.

effects: Gain 4 Trireme resources. Denounced- Chosen Argonaut gains +1 DangerIcon.

effects: Gain 3 Armament resources. Denounced- Chosen Argonaut gains +1 DangerIcon.

name: Desecrated Temple
effects: Gain 3 Monument resources. Denounced- Gain +1 StrangersIcon.

name: Hidden Temple
effects: Gain 4 Monument resources. You may gain +3 ArgoFateIcon to gain +1 Priest.

name: Egyptian War Fleet
effects: Gain 5 Trireme resources. Allied Lose -1 ArgoFateIcon.

effects: Gain 6 Trireme resources. Allied Lose -1 ArgoFateIcon.

name: Bronze People Armory
effects: Gain 5 Armament resources. Allied Gain +1 ArgoKnowledgeIcon (once until the next Timeline Battle).

name: Grand Temple Ruins
effects: Gain 5 Monument resources. Allied Gain +1 ProgressIcon.

name: Untamed Titan
effects: Gain +1 Titan. Friendly+ Chosen Argonaut gains +1 RageIcon.

name: Hekatrap
effects: At the end of this Exploration Step, resolve an Ambush Battle (Cycle I Storybook, p. 112). ArgoFateIcon 8+ At the start of this battle, Escalate 1.

name: Informant Network
effects: Gain +1 ProgressIcon. Allied Roll a d10. On 8+ gain +1 ArgoKnowledgeIcon.
removeEffect: Remove until the next Timeline Battle

name: Cackle
effects: ArgoFateIcon 8+ Resolve an additional AdversaryIcon.
removeEffect: Remove until the next Timeline Battle

name: Maze Pilgrim
effects: Gain +1 StrangersIcon (If on a LabyrinthiansIcon Map Tile: gain +2 Strangers instead). If you then have 3+ StrangersIcon, see 0014 in the Fated Conundrum hub. ArgoFateIcon 5+ Gain 1 additional StrangersIcon. ArgoFateIcon 7+ Random Argonaut gains 1 Despair token.
removeEffect: Remove until the next Timeline Battle

name: Maze Storm
effects: Gain +1 DoomIcon. ArgoFateIcon 7+ Gain +2 DoomIcon instead.
removeEffect: Remove until the next Timeline Battle

name: Recruitment Drive
effects: Gain +1 CrewIcon. Allied Lose -1 ArgoFateIcon.

name: Theban Trader
effects: Trading
removeEffect: Remove until the next Timeline Battle

name: Heart Of The Maze
effects: You're Ambushed by the Temenos itself! At the end of this Exploration Step, resolve a Temenos Battle (note Special Aftermath 0006). ArgoFateIcon 8+ At the start of this battle, Escalate 1.
